title: Retail Supply License
excerpt:
A retail supply license shall authorize the licensee to supply

electricity to its customers and for that purpose to engage in

purchasing and selling of electricity.

A retail license holder may purchase electricity for sale from a

generation licensee, and with the approval of the authority, may

purchase power from other sources. All such purchases shall be made

in an open, transparent, and competitive manner, subject to the review

of the authority.
description: A retail supply license shall authorize the licensee to supply electricity to its customers and for that purpose to engage in purchasing and selling of electricity. A retail license holder may purchase electricity for sale from a generation licensee, and with the approval of the authority, may purchase power from other sources. All such purchases shall be made in an open, transparent, and competitive manner, subject to the review of the authority.
application_process:
Who may apply

          
An application for a licence may be made by any legal person including individuals, incorporated associations, and corporations.

 

Entities that are not a legal person (for example, an unincorporated joint venture) cannot apply for a licence.

 

How to apply for a license

 

An applicants must apply for a license to provide electricity utility service in accordance with Section 62 of the Act in the prescribed form, accompanied by the prescribed fee, and any additional information or documents required.

 

Application forms are available at www.nea.gov.pg and should be sent to the:

 

Electronic Copy:                              economicregulation@nea.gov.pg

 

Hard Copy:                                        Managing Director

National Energy Authority
Goada Herea Building,

Section 58, Allotment 3, Waigani Drive
P.O. Box 494, Waigani 131 NCD
Papua New Guinea.

 

Applicants are encouraged to familiarize themselves with the Act and other relevant codes before submitting their applications.

title: Copy of Distribution License
excerpt:
A distribution license shall authorize the licensee to

construct, operate, and maintain a distribution network system and

facilities, including any of the following services as may be specified in

the license:

a) the connection of customers for the purpose of receiving electricity

services.

b) the installation, maintenance, and reading of meters, billing, and 

collection bills.

c) such other distribution service as may be prescribed for the

purposes of this section.

d) Auto producer that distributes power for its own consumption.

c) such other distribution service as may be prescribed for the purposes of this section.

d) Auto producer that distributes power for its own consumption.

title: Transmission License
excerpt:
A transmission license shall authorize the licensee to carry on

grid construction, operation, and maintenance of transmission facilities

within Papua New Guinea.
description: A transmission license shall authorize the licensee to carry on grid construction, operation, and maintenance of transmission facilities within Papua New Guinea.

title: Generation License
excerpt:
A generation license shall authorize the license holder to construct,

own, operate, and maintain a generation power plant intended for own

use or supply to a transmission owner, or distribute or retail

electricity.

A license holder of a generation license may supply electricity to

any transmission, distribution, and retail/supply licensee who

purchases electricity for resale and, with the approval of the

Authority, to any one or more consumers.
description:
A generation license shall authorize the license holder to construct, own, operate, and maintain a generation power plant intended for own use or supply to a transmission owner, or distribute or retail electricity.

A license holder of a generation license may supply electricity to any transmission, distribution, and retail/supply licensee who purchases electricity for resale and, with the approval of the Authority, to any one or more consumers.
content: Penalties: Failure to obtain a license or comply with license conditions may result in fines, suspension, or termination of operations.
